name: Pill Puzzle 2
description:
The bigger your business, the greater the responsibility!

Now in addition to always paying attention to the color, type and position of the pills and fitting one pill at a time, in the right order, to complete the pack, you also need to pay attention to your customers' bandages, carefully pushing them into the box to give them what they need.

Resources:

  • 50 Levels.
  • No time counter.
  • Steam achievements.
